views.markdown:
Version: 1.1.7 - Minor adjustment Version: 1.1.6
- Suppress confirmation window when you queue packages using swipe actions


Version: 1.1.5
- Bugs fixed and improvement
Version: 1.1.4
- Suppress confirmation page when queueing packages, unless there is any issue when computing dependencies (cleaner and faster queue operations)
- Disable downgrade option if the current package is in "clear" state
- Use icon option is enabled by default
Version: 1.1-3
- Preferences page updated, fix some confusion
Version: 1.1-2
- Code correction
Version: 1.1-1
- Some improvement to auto install/remove
Version: 1.0-7
- Fix crash in iOS < 9

Version: 1.0-6
- Fix some crash in iOS 9
- Queue reinstall function added
- Downgrade function added
- A refinement in settings page
Special thanks to Karen Tsai @angelXwind Version: 1.0-5
- Resolved some issue.
Version: 1.0-4
- Fixes and improvement.
Version: 1.0-3
- Fix: upgrading paid package via swipe doesn't work.
- Fix: installing paid package via swipe doesn't work.
- Add: "Use icons" option for those want to shorten options width.

Version: 1.0-2
- Fix: clearing package via swipe doesn't dismiss queue sheet in some case.
- Fix: reinstalling commercial package doesn't work.
- Fix: localized "reinstall" string length issue in some languages.
- Note: (queue) purchasing commercial package via swipe doesn't work yet.
